text: Lavell Maurice Crawford (born November 11, 1968) is an American stand-up comedian and actor. He is best known for playing Huell Babineaux, the bodyguard, assistant, and pickpocket for Saul Goodman in Breaking Bad. Lavell also played the role of Gus Patch in the Netflix original movie The Ridiculous 6. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Comedians from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Actors from St. Louis, Missouri
title: Lavell Crawford
